rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0001
rows.name:
While I was giving out rations,
I heard the soldiers talking.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0002
rows.name:
They were saying that Lett Bridge
still hasn't been repaired.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0003
rows.name:
What, still? We sent workers there
a while back. What's held them up?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0004
rows.name:
From what I hear, Gogols
have been giving them no end of grief.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0005
rows.name:
I thought we'd pre-empted that, too.
Didn't we send enough guards? I must
have underestimated the problem.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0006
rows.name: These Gogols sound pretty tough...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0007
rows.name:
They're really not. I could see them
being a handful in packs, though. For
your average soldier, anyway.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0008
rows.name:
Those things are what destroyed the
bridge in the first place.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0009
rows.name:
If we don't get that bridge repaired,
it's going to seriously delay our going
to and from the capital.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0010
rows.name: How are Hugo/Wadatsumi?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0011
rows.name:
I believe it may still be a while before
they return.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0012
rows.name:
Great. Then let's go and wrap this
whole bridge affair up before Hugo
gets back.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0013
rows.name: OK, we'll help you with that.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0014
rows.name: Actually, I might have to pass...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0015
rows.name: Oh? What's wrong? Not feeling well?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0016
rows.name: No, it's not that...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0017
rows.name:
It's just, I promised that I'd make
my special dish tomorrow.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0018
rows.name: Forget about that!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0019
rows.name:
I'll get all the ingredients and
what-have-you, so you can focus on
helping Adel-sama. He needs you!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0020
rows.name: We really could do with the help, Shin

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0021
rows.name:
You can always cook later, to
celebrate the bridge's repair!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0022
rows.name: All right then...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0023
rows.name:
Heh, or you could just leave all that
to me. I'll cook up a feast for the ages!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0024
rows.name: No you flipping well won't!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0025
rows.name:
I'll wager nothing tastes as good as
a good meal after some solid training!

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0029
rows.name:
That sounds about right.
I ate so much, I feel like I'm gonna
burst...

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0026
rows.name: Pardon me, Adel-sama, Sir?

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0027
rows.name: We'll set out early tomorrow morning.

rows.label: fev11_380_170_msg0028
rows.name:
There will be time enough to cook later,
after we get rid of the Gogols. We can
celebrate our victory!
